# Breaking News: Dan goes Dev

### Hello, World!

After 10 years in audiovisual production, and my whole life loving technology and doing some programming as a hobby, I switched carreer and became a software developer.

This profile holds some public experiments, a few solutions developed for production, and whatever I can share pubicly done at my own time outside of work.
<br><br>

---

### 📽️Diapason Produções Audiovisuais - 
This is the audio and video production company I started in 2012 and quit in 2022 to focus on software. They're still going. There, I worked with production and managing the business but also I was the tech guy for everything: built and setup the website, domain, google suite, dns, all of it. And setup systems for production and wrote a few small software solutions for certain jobs, specially ones to aid in live streaming. I have a major in Music Production Technology and I am an Audio Specialist through Berklee where I studied Acoustics, Mastering and Licensing. You can learn a bit more about Diapason in the links below.

<a href="https://www.diapason.com.br" target="_blank"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/-Website-%23EA4335?&logo=data:image/png;base64," target="_blank"></a>
<a href="https://instagram.com/diapasonproducoes" target="_blank"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/-Instagram-E4405F?&logo=instagram&logoColor=white" target="_blank"></a>
<a href="https://www.youtube.com/DiapasonProducoes" target="_blank"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/YouTube--Diapason-FF0000?&logo=youtube&logoColor=white" target="_blank"></a>
<a href="mailto:dan@diapason.com.br" target="_blank"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/-E--mail-EA4335?&logo=gmail&logoColor=white" target="_blank"></a>
